title: Login fails for users with special characters in password
description: Several users report 'Invalid credentials' when their password contains characters like # or % even though the password is correct.

title: Invoice PDF download returns 500 error
description: Downloading invoice PDFs intermittently fails with a 500. Observed mostly on large invoices with 50+ line items.

title: Search results show outdated data after profile update
description: After editing a user profile, global search still shows old name/email until cache expires.

title: Mobile: Checkout button overlaps coupon input
description: On small screens (<360px), the checkout CTA overlaps the coupon field making it hard to apply discounts.

title: Email notifications not sent for password reset
description: Password reset emails are not being delivered for some domains. Logs show 'queued' but no delivery events.

title: Users see 'Access denied' after role change
description: When an admin changes a user's role from Viewer to Editor, the user still gets 'Access denied' until they log out/in.

title: Analytics dashboard loads slowly for large accounts
description: Dashboard takes 12â€“18 seconds to load for accounts with >100k events/day. Suspect heavy aggregation query.

title: CSV export missing rows when filtered by date range
description: Exporting CSV with a date range filter sometimes omits the last day's data. Possibly timezone boundary issue.

title: Payment gateway webhook retries causing duplicate orders
description: Webhook retries from the payment provider are occasionally creating duplicate orders when idempotency key is missing.

title: UI: Dark mode contrast issues on settings page
description: Text on the settings page is too dim in dark mode, especially section labels and helper text.
